metadata.name: France
metadata.description:
Chad Sports method of gamifying sporting competitions makes them even more fun to watch! 

 Starting with the World Cup 2022, Participants have 3 ways to earn from the Prize Pool: Raffle | Prediction Competition | 1/1 Auctions. 

 These Team NFTs are part of the Prediction Competition which has participants Predicting which teams will place in the top 4 positions of World Cup 2022, and then stake their NFTs accordingly. 

 Participants can swap teams depending on how the tournament progresses, up until the last 8 teams remain.
